sqlList.name: SELECT_IMPLICIT_CROSS_JOIN
sqlList.desc: 测试两个表的隐式交叉连接
sqlList.sql: select a.*, b.* from tableA as a, tableB as b where 1 = 1

sqlList.name: SELECT_EXPLICIT_CROSS_JOIN
sqlList.desc: 测试两个表的显式交叉连接
sqlList.sql: select a.*, b.* from tableA as a cross join tableB as b where 1 = 1

sqlList.name: SELECT_JOIN
sqlList.sql: select a.*, b.* from tableA as a join tableB as b where 1 = 1

sqlList.name: SELECT_LEFT_JOIN
sqlList.sql: select a.*, b.* from tableA as b left join tableB as b where 1 = 1

sqlList.name: SELECT_RIGHT_JOIN
sqlList.sql: select a.*, b.* from tableA as b right join tableB as b where 1 = 1

sqlList.name: SELECT_JOIN_ON
sqlList.sql: select a.*, b.* from tableA as a join tableB as b on tableA.aid = tableB.bid where 1 = 1

sqlList.name: SELECT_JOIN_USING
sqlList.sql: select a.*, b.* from tableA as a join tableB as b using (recordId) where 1 = 1
